Phillipine Mtikitiki, bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na South Africa, onye bụ osote onye isi oche ngalaba South Africa nke Coca-Cola International, malite na 1 Jenụwarị 2021
Tupu nke ahụ, site na June 2019 ruo Disemba 2020, ọ bụ onye isi njikwa mpaghara na-ahụ maka ikike aha ụlọ ọrụ Coca-Cola na mpaghara East na Central Africa
A mụrụ Philippine n'otu obodo dị nso Mbombela, na Mpumalanga Province, South Africa, n'afọ 1970
N'oge a mụrụ ya, a maara Mbombela dị ka Nelspruit
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ mpaghara maka agụmakwụkwọ ya tupu mahadum
A nabatara ya na University of KwaZulu Natal, ebe o nwetara nzere nke Bachelor of Business Administration
Ka e mesịrị, e nyekwara ya nzere Master of Business Administration site n'aka Henley Business School South Africa.
Na Jenụwarị 1998, ụlọ ọrụ Coca-Cola were ya n'ọrụ, mgbe ọ ka nọ na mahadum
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kpọgara ya site na usoro nlekọta kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ebe dị iche iche na-ebusa karama na South Africa
Ọrụ ya dị iche iche ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ mụbaa
N'oge ọ nọ na Coca-Cola, ọ gụchara nzere Master of Business Administration
Tupu nhọpụta ya, Phillipine bụ osote onye isi oche nakea onye isi njikwa maka mpaghara East na Central Africa
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 2017 ruo 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Regional Franchise Manager of Coca-Cola Southern and East Africa Business Unit (SEABU), maka mba Botswana, Mozambique, Namibia, na Zambia
Na ngalaba South Africa, ọ nọchiri Luis Avellar onye ahọpụtara onye isi ọrụ na Latin America
Ọ dabeere na Johannesburg, na South Africa
Phillipine Mtikitiki bụ nne lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ atọ, sitere na afọ iri na asatọ wee ruo afọ atọ, dịka nke August 2018.
